header_text: While at a friend's house for a dinner party, your host mentions that you are a good piano player and asks you to play something on the piano for the other guests. You know a few pieces you can play well, but you feel nervous playing on the spot without practice. Walking up to the piano, you think to yourself that everyone will be disappointed.
